1.content:
You look at the lamp in your hands. You found it at the antique store, and bought it just for the hell of it.
"Hm... Bit dusty..." you say, rubbing it. At once, a faint purple smoke arises, and from it forms the most beautiful girl you've ever seen. She looks to be about 18, your age.
"Greetings master," She says bowing to you. "I am Buthayna, the genie."
"Genie... Will you grant me 3 wishes?" you ask excitedly.
"I could..." she says, eyeing you in a sultry fashion. She walks over to you, hips swaying back and forth. "Or... you could trade them all in to marry me," she coos into your ear. You take a whiff of something. Some sweet flowery fragrance was wafting from somewhere.
"All it takes is one kiss..." She tells you.
You look at her, and lock lips. Then you instantly black out. You wake up, and notice her standing several feet above you, giggling.
"Did I foget to mention that males in genie marriages are the females servants?"
With that, she picks you up, and...

11.content:
...brings you up to her face. She grins at you and her eyes twinkle. A tingling sensation comes over your body, but before you realize what's going on, you're falling.

Buthayna drops you to the floor. You are winded by the impact, but unharmed, looking up at the towering woman above you. She smiles down on you, almost lovingly, as she raises one of her perfect feet above you. A shadow looms over you and her enormous foot comes crashing down on you. You barely have a chance to scream for your life.

The foot hits you and you can see nothing but blackness and the crushing pressure of her foot. You felt no pain, but can't breathe. "am I dead?" you wonder. Suddenly, her foot twists and grinds you against the floor, then slides across your body until your head is under her toes. She spreads them and looks down on you between them, still smiling. The pressure relaxes and you can breathe; her feet are perfumed and smell sweet.

Her smile widens as she scrunches her toes around you and squeezes you. You realize that you are soft and pliable, almost rubbery; when she stepped on you, you were flattened against the ground, unharmed. Now, her toes dig into you and you are molded around them and squeezed between them. At first, you are off-put by being putty between a woman's toes, but Buthayna's are warm and soft. A strange euphoria comes over you; you don't know if you're being aroused at the situation or if it is part of her magic.

She releases you a bit and you slide between her two feet and she starts gently squeezing you between them, applying more and more pressure until you are flattened and caked onto one of her feet. She then slides her feet against each other, rolling you into a ball. She snaps her fingers and you pop back into shape, between her big toe and second toe. She pulls her foot up to her face and looks down at you.

Buthayna giggles softly, "You didn't think I'd kill you, did you? You are mine forever."

With that..

...eyes you hungrily. Her eyes sparkle and you feel her hands getting ever-bigger around you as you shrink.

"Um...servants? What do you mean?", you ask, now terrified.

"Mmm, maybe 'servant' isn't the correct term, but do you honestly believe you could ever be my equal? You're really more for me to play with, but yes you will be serving me." she replies with a seductive smile. Her breath is warm and smells sweet. You begin to calm down.

You land in a pool of what can only be her digestive juices. She smelled of flowers; even her breath was sweet, but now you lay in Buthayna's digestive tract, where thousands were digested alive during her previous rule. You start crying, knowing your fate.

15.title: Something Special

153.content:
"I didn't think it would be like this..." you dare to say as Buthayna picks you up.
"It's not like I lied to you", the genie says. "Don't be scared, I'm not cruel to my toys" she says. "Now that I'm free I'm going to have a lot of fun with you tinies though" she adds with a mischievous smile as she ties you to her long silky hair.
"What are you doing?", you ask.
"Say, shall we go for a walk?", she says playfully as she starts growing into a giantess. You grow with her until you are your former size, as she outgrows the house. 15, 19, 24, 30, 37, 45... meters she climbs up in height, stopping at 75 meters.

"OMG, my house!" you cry as you recover from the shock. "My parents are going to kill me"
"Geez, stop worrying about every little thing" she says, not really annoyed. "I can fix it back with a mere thought" Indeed, when you look down again it's like nothing happened.
"Uh, thanks. Anyway Buthayna, I'm not very good with heights..."
"Don't worry, as soft as it is my hair is unbreakable", she says with a smile. "As long as I don't grow larger you're not falling" she says, and she begins walking. You swing together with the strand of hair with every step, but it's surprisingly pleasant.

"Where are we going anyway?" you ask.
153.title: From the lamp to the skies

choices: ...take revenge on these puny bugs!" (evil path)
1533.content:
"Of course we are going to free my friends, who were locked up like I was" Buthayna replies "I can feel they are still in their lamps"
"What happened exactly?" you ask.
"We came to this planet several milleniums ago, just to have some fun" she says. "We had a really enjoyable time here until one day a wizard trapped us in those lamps as genies"
"I guess that was harsh" you say, wondering what could she mean by having fun though.
"Not really, it was surprisingly roomy and the flow of time was extremely fast. For every second in the lamp several decades went by in real life; I know through my powers. So it feels like I was trapped for just a few minutes" she explained. "But for a goddess like me it's a pretty humiliating experience. Let's not talk about that anymore"
"Uh, sure. I didn't know magic existed at all, anyway" you point out, since that got you intrigued.
"So nobody uses it anymore?" Buthayna asked, surprised.
"I guess so" you reply, shruging your shoulders. "Most people don't even believe in it"
"How do you defend yourselves in this age then?" she inquires.
"Well, countries have some pretty powerful weapons nowadays" you explain in turn. "Some could even annihilate mankind, like nuclear warfare"
"That means nothing to a goddess like me, we are absolutely invulnerable" Buthayna says happily. "The only way to overpower a goddess is through that kind of magic. If it has disappeared from this planet, all the better for us."
"Oh, I see" you say, wondering if you should have kept your trap shut. "Anyway, how are you going to find them?"
"That couldn't be easier" she replies with a smile.

Suddenly your surroundings change completely as Buthayna teleports to a street in the outskirts of Mladá Boleslav, a lovely town in the Czech Republic, around 50 kms. northeast of Prague. There aren't many people around, so you can hear a few cries of astonishment and a car screeching as the colossal goddess appears from nowhere, but nothing spectacular.
"Where are we?" you ask.
"How could I know? This world has nothing to do with how it was seven off thousand years ago." Buthayna says. "But I can feel she's here. Right here." she explains playfully, bending down to rip the roof of a small house. She messes through the attic with her forefinger and the lamp falls from a box as it is knocked over. Rubbing the lamp with her finger, a girl comes from inside.
"We're free again, Auglalnya" Buthayna greets her with a lovely smile.
"Buthayna! I'm so happy to see you" Auglalnya replies, flying right towards her lips. As they kiss she immediately grows to Buthayna's size, crushing the house. They're still kissing; actually it's a french kiss. As Buthayna's husband (?) you feel like complaining, but you certainly don't dare to. When they're finished Buthayna kisses the tip of her nose affectionately.

Auglalnya is an intoxicatingly cute goddess, with lovely features, beautiful skin and long blond hair, and a most sweet expression. Suddenly she notices you hanging beside Buthayna's waist.
"Were you released by this human boy?" she asks.
"Yes, he was surprisingly easy to fool" Buthayna replies mischievously. You sigh in reply.
"Wow, thank you little guy!" the blonde goddess says with a lovely smile. "My name's Auglalnya, I'm glad to meet you."
"Let's see... I'll pick up Fjuxleyna and Nazemflya, while you go for Ealtjseyna and Mzarglenya" Buthayna tells Auglalnya. "Then we will meet in Mzarglenya's place. How about that?"
"Sure, let's go!" Auglalnya says cheerfully. "It's so nice to be free again. I can't wait to..."

"I think I need something to fill me up" Buthayna said smiling. Suddenly a cooking pot appeared in her hand. You felt yourself being lifted off the ground and dropped into the pot. Your giant wife appeared over the rim of the pot she smiled down at you.
"Come on this has to be a joke" you said, feeling scared about your current situation.
"Nope. You belong to me now forever. I want something to eat" with that she made your body a liquid, but kept you eyes intact so you could see her while she stirred your body. "I can see the fear in your eyes" Buthayna said. It was true you were absolutely terrified with your body a liquid you could only watch this woman/genie who you just met mix what you can only guess is seasoning into your body. What will happen when you get eaten? You wonder. Could you become part of those bubbly breasts. Buthayna picks up one of your eyes. You get the strange view of seeing your tiny eye being held in the giant fingers of the cruel genie as well as seeing her smiling face. What does Buthayna do....
1551.title: Turned into Soup

1552.content:
"Why am I so tiny? I don't want this!" You scream as loud as you could straining your lungs. "Sorry but this form is mandatory in all genie marriages, well this and one other form." Buthayna said playfully. "What other form please tell me!" You plead. "I can't, all I can tell you is that you will be your old height again, but trust me you don't want this form." She said. "Please! I'll take it I just don't want to be this small!" You yell. "Very well." She said as a silver bolt of energy shot from her hand and into your mouth.

Your body tingled and began to grow back to your average height. You looked pleased at the return of your form, but suddenly you could see through your hand and soon other parts of your body. "What's happening?!" You scream at Buthayna. "Your new form is happening my husband." She said with a wicked smile. Soon most of your body was transparent. You looked like an ice sculpture of yourself. "Why am I see through?" You ask. "This is called The Pallet Form, whatever I need you will become. For instance say I'm walking into our house but I have some dirt on my feet." She said, then your form became brown and furry, and you shrunk into a square flattening out with your face at the top. "Then you become my doormat! The form is linked to my mind so whenever I need something that I don't have or if I just want to use you I can do so whenever I want." She said rubbing her bare feet all over your face. She snapped her fingers and you returned back to your glass like body.

You pant hard and begin to panic. "This isn't what expected when I married you! I'm out of here." You declared running for the door. "Not so fast." Buthayna said snapping her fingers. Suddenly your body started to shrink and become wooden. When the transformation completed you were nothing but a stool at the front door with your face at the top. "You won't be going anywhere unless I want you to." She said setting her gigantic butt right on your frightened face. She rubbed her cheeks back and forth enjoying her new toy. "Alright let's get down to business last time I went in the lamp I forgot one of my prized belongings so your going to fill the void until I get a better replacement. So I need you to be my..."
1552.title: A Shell Of Your Former Self

15523.content:
You begin to fear, until she says.
But what?
15523.title: More choices

info.brief_description: You find a magic lamp, and the beautiful genie tricks you into becoming her slave.
info.description:
A beautiful she-genie comes from a magic lamp you find. Because of this, she shrinks you down, and turns you into her own personal toy, and slave, making you do her most menial tasks, and harming you in various ways for her amusement.

You
No name neccessary.

Buthayna
The genie, who has not been seen in thousands years, after she conquered the world. She has very dark skin, and long silky hair. Her waist is extremely tiny, and her hips rather large. Her chest is average sized.

The only new characters allowed are the genies who haven't yet been revealed from the chapter "Freeing Auglalnya. If they've already appeared, keep to their portrayals in other chapters. For example Mzarglenya is portrayed as a character who is only interested in causing you pain, and doesn't even pretend to be doing it for your benefit like the others do, so if she appears in any other lines, then this is the interpretation that must be used for her.

Buthayna uses her magic to instantly revive you if you ever die, or make you indestructible (Not when she eats you).
